textField.name: The Live Young Training
textField.text:
What could be more precious than youth? Luckily, we can all stay young at heart with a little motivation!
So let the evian Babies coach you on how to help cultivate and maintain your youthful heart and spirit!
textField.mailUnvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
textField.passMailUnvalid: Either your email address or your password is incorrect.
